events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the Refund category due to the customer's request for money back.
Customer support agent Emily has been assigned to handle this refund request case.
Hello! I'm Emily from customer support. I'm here to help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and any photos of the incorrect item you received?
My order number is 123456789. I have attached photos showing that the item I got is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We can process a full refund to your original payment method immediately.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the refund offer and confirm I would like to proceed.
The refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount reflected on your account within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for your help and prompt service!
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
